title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 352.10 - Payment of life insurance premiums
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 352.10 - Payment of life insurance premiums

State Regulations

Life insurance premiums shall be met under the following
circumstances and conditions: (a) when
the recipient is aged, his life expectancy is short, or he is deemed
uninsurable; or
(b) by vendor
payment when the policy is assigned to the agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
352.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
